You'll want to write the name of a character in each blank, but it's not the character shown in the screenshot.
All of the movie screenshots share a common situation.

Each screenshot contains a character slightly offscreen holding on to the depicted character. You'll want to write the name of that character in the blanks and read out the boxed letters to get a hint to the last step.
Of these 24 characters, 7 of them are pulled up and rescued, while the other 17 are let go for various reasons and die (or appear to die). What letters correspond to these 7 characters?
